description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooked Lamb Shoulder With Chilli Coconut recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Slow Cooked Lamb Shoulder With Chilli Coconut
name: Slow Cooked Lamb Shoulder With Chilli Coconut Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch kale, washed and dried, stems removed

recipeInstructions.text: Shred the lamb with two forks and serve with pumpkin mash, kale chips, cauliflower and extra marinade.
